name: Witcher Switcher
description:
This is the game about some cat in the fantasy world  and  must to esacpe  the  witch hunter. But you have power to control  and  switch the temperature of your pet. and fight with them.

CONTROL

  • WASD  to move.
  • Left Click to fire.
  • R to switch teh temperature of your pet.
    • Fire ball : Assult bullet.
    • Ice ball : Explode Bullet.
